label: ProtectionMeans
comment: A way to protect something, such as human beings, animals or environment, from getting infected or becoming ill.

objectProperties.comment: The indication of whether or not this disease protection means is accepted.
The code specifying the category of disease protection means.
A textual description of this disease protection means.
An item, expressed as text, for this disease protection means.
A restriction, expressed as text, for this disease protection means.

referencedBy.comment: A disease protection means notified for this guest person.
